long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task management canvas. Not your grandfather's to do list app. Task Canvas lets you manage your to do items using an intuitive visual canvas interface, based on the importance and urgency of each task.

* Note: This app is work in progress. Feedback is greatly appreciated.

* Important: Before upgrading to a newer version, please "export" your data from the Settings page. Upgrading the extension will clean up the old data.
